channel.title: Protocols on A plant researcher
channel.description: Recent content in Protocols on A plant researcher

item.title: Pea cultivation protocol (ver. 1.0.0)
item.description: General information Pea (Pisum sativum L., cv. Greenfeast) cultivation protocol for ANU works. This protocol is based on Chow & Anderson, 1987 and Zhu et al., 2016 with some minor modifications. Protocol Sowing (Day 0) Germination rate is approximately 85–90%. x1.5 seeds should be sown. soak seeds in water for ~ 5 h sow seeds into cylinders filled with PAC soil cylinder diameter: ~ 37 mm cylinder height: ~ 70 mm arrange cylinders in round-hole plug-tray (8 x 5 holes) place plug-trays in a growth cabinet temp: 20C RH: 60% PPFD: 360 umol m-2 s-1 (photoperiod: 16 h) CO2: ambient supply water until germination Transplant (~ Day 6) Transplant seedlings to pots.
